faqs.question: Do you offer delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, we deliver through FoodPanda and our own fleet within 5km.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept? How can I pay?
faqs.answer: We accept cash, credit/debit cards, and mobile payments.

faqs.question: Do I need to make a reservation?
faqs.answer: Reservations are recommended for weekends, but walk-ins are always welcome!

faqs.question: Do you have vegetarian options?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have a variety of vegetarian pizzas, pastas, and burgers. Check our menu for details.

faqs.question: Is your food Halal?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our meat is 100% Halal certified.

faqs.question: Do you have parking?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a dedicated parking lot for our customers.

faqs.question: How can I contact you?
faqs.answer: You can call us at our branch numbers or email us at contact@speedybites.com.
